contentList.content: Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> immediately and as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> on each of your turns until this spell ends.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> available as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Enhance the vigor of you and your allies, increasing <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1].
Strike with your weapon wreathed in flames, setting your target ablaze for [1] turns.
Engulf your weapon in Selûne's light, inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Flame</LSTag> for [1] turns on a hit.
